title: How to Make a Paper Folder

steps.title: Get
steps.content: Get 6 pieces of paper. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Staple
steps.content: Staple two pieces together, leaving the top unstapled . This will be the folder part.

steps.title: Repeat step #2 with the other two pieces of paper.
steps.content: Repeat step #2 with the other two pieces of paper. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Fold
steps.content: Fold one piece of construction paper [3] X Research source

steps.title: Staple
steps.content: Staple the shorter sides together, leaving the top (longest edge) unstapled. This will be the pocket in the folder.

steps.title: Repeat steps 4 and 5 with the other piece of construction paper.
steps.content: Repeat steps 4 and 5 with the other piece of construction paper. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Staple
steps.content: Staple in the "pockets" to both "folders". Make sure the "pockets" openings are facing up.

steps.title: Staple the separate "folders" together on one edge, so it will flip open.
steps.content: Staple the separate "folders" together on one edge, so it will flip open. Make sure the "pockets" are inside.

steps.title: Decorate
steps.content: Decorate your folder! You now have an awesome homemade folder.
